roleset.name: reduce costs
roleset.note: ECONOMIZE-V NOTES: More typically intransitive, I'd bet. (from economize.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: While some 100 million ounces of silver once held by Mr. Hunt and Middle Eastern associates aren't hanging over the market anymore, the price surge of 1979-80 precipitated an expansion of mine production and scrap recovery and encouraged silver consumers to economize on silver use, Mr. Edgar says.
